title: Mexican vegetable and polenta pie
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon sunflower oil', '1 stick celery, chopped', '1 large clove garlic, crushed', '150g (5 ½ oz) onions, chopped', '1/2 green pepper, chopped', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '400g tin red kidney beans, drained and rinsed', '12 stoned green olives, sliced', '1 tablespoon chopped jalapeño peppers', '75g (2 ¾ oz) canned sweetcorn, drained', '400g tin chopped tomatoes', '1 tablespoon tomato purée', 'salt and black pepper', 'For the topping', '125g (4½ oz) polenta (cornmeal)', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 egg, beaten', '100ml (3 ½ fl oz) skimmed milk', '25g (1 oz) half-fat mature Cheddar cheese, grated']
